"Seasonal Regional Mags":
"During this Seasonal Event, Regional Mags become Seasonal Regional Mags.

You can increase Seasonal Regional Mags' fullness very quickly by feeding them Gathering Materials that can only be found during the Seasonal Event."

"During this Seasonal Event, Regional Mags become Seasonal Regional Mags.

During the Seasonal Event period, the Regional Mag Boost [All] will also boost the appearance rate of Seasonal Enemies."
